mapper.update: MERGE INTO WISH_LIST USING DUAL ON (EXHIBITION_ID = ${id} AND CUSTOMER_ID ='${request}') WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET WISH_LIST_FLAG = 'N' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (WISH_LIST_ID, EXHIBITION_ID , CUSTOMER_ID , WISH_LIST_FLAG) VALUES (seq_wish_list.nextval , ${id} , '${request}' , 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT distinct ei.* FROM WISH_LIST wl , EXHIBITION_INFO ei , CUSTOMER_INFO ci WHERE wl.CUSTOMER_ID = ci.CUSTOMER_ID AND wl.EXHIBITION_ID = ei.EXHIBITION_ID AND '${request}' = ci.CUSTOMER_IDAND wl.WISH_LIST_FLAG = 'N'
